rook.api.transport

Class GrowableBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • rook.api.transport.GrowableBuffer

  • public class GrowableBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    A buffer backed by a byte[] array that contains a variable length and can grow as necessary to fit a larger payload
    Author:
    Eric Thill

        Parameters:

      • reserve

        public GrowableBuffer reserve(int length,
                              boolean copy)
        Grows the underlying buffer to the given length
        Parameters:
        length - The required size of the payload that this buffer will need to contain
        copy - If true, existing contents will be copied if the underlying buffer is grown
        Returns:
        this (for stringing together commands)
